title: Scaling NeoBank Partnerships
text: Led end-to-end commercial discussions, negotiations, and contract closures with partners ensuring business alignment, onboarded 10+ partners and ensured 8 successful go-lives.
Drove 100:0 lending partnerships growth by identifying and establishing strategic partnerships with key industry players based on policy and workflow compatibility.

title: Managing Enterprises
text: Led the digitization of Co-lending, Supply Chain Finance, and Collections initiatives for PSU banks, collaborating with internal and external teams.
Drove revenue growth by securing sign-offs from 12 NBFCs and 4 Anchors for Co-lending and SCF. Took  2 NBFCs and 3 Anchors live, enabling ₹400+ crore in disbursements.
